hero_intro: Providing licensed, insured residential & commercial electrical solutions in Miami and surrounding areas.
hero_mission: Our mission is to deliver exceptional service with energy‑efficient, code‑compliant workmanship that protects your home or business.
services_lead: Core solutions we provide to homes & businesses:
svc_install_desc: Safe, efficient wiring & new circuits for remodels and builds.
svc_maint_desc: Troubleshooting, panel issues, breakers, outlets & safety fixes.
svc_led_desc: Modern, efficient indoor & outdoor LED + automation upgrades.
faq_q1: What electrical services do you offer?
faq_a1: We handle new installations, repairs, maintenance, LED upgrades, panel & wiring improvements, permits and more.
faq_q2: How are your services environmentally friendly?
faq_a2: We promote energy efficiency with LED, smart controls, proper load design and sustainable material choices where possible.
faq_a3: Yes. All work is backed by workmanship assurance and code‑compliant standards.
testimonial_quote: Ecosmart Electric transformed our lighting — lower consumption, better ambience, professional service throughout.
contact_lead: Request a quote, inspection or emergency assistance:
about_body: Ecosmart Electric delivers reliable, code‑compliant electrical services with a sustainability focus. From modernizations to troubleshooting, our licensed technicians emphasize safety, clarity and long‑term performance.
